Name: Dart Around
Description: Skip the Draw step of the next night.

Name: Bury Deep
Description:
Deal 1 damage.
Gain 2 vitality.
Remove 2 time counters.
Move a card from your partner's field to your field.

Name: Fur Frenzy
Description: Deal 2 damage. If you have no cards in hand, deal 2 damage to each enemy instead.

Name: Nut Assault
Description: Deal X damage, where X is half the number of cards on your field, rounded up.

Name: Fill Cheeks
Description:
Perform your draw ability.
For the rest of this turn, after you discard a card, return it to your hand.
